*Create a password:*
{{{
Password password = TimeLockPassword.createPassword("abid", TimeType.HOUR, 0, 24);

// save password in database
String storePass = password.getPassword();
}}}

*Confirm password:*
{{{
String dbPassword = "passwordFromDatabase";
Password dynamicPassword = PasswordFactory.getInstance(dbPassword);
boolean result = dynamicPassword.confirmPassword("confirmPassword");
}}}

*Usage:*
{{{
Password password = TimeLockPassword.createPassword("abid", TimeType.HOUR, 1, 6);
}}}

This will only allows password between the hours of 1am and 6am.

{{{
Password password = TimeLockPassword.createPassword("abid", TimeType.MINUTE, 15, 45);
}}}

This will only allow passwords to function between the minutes of 15 and 30.
